alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued June 19 at 2:35PM PDT until June 21 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PDT TUESDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TUESDAY NIGHT TO 9 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 mph. For the first Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. For the second Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County, Southwest Elko County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 11 PM PDT this evening. For the first Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM PDT Tuesday. For the second Frost Advisory, from midnight Tuesday night to 9 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
